content.raw: I’ve also modified the default text editor and HDF5 viewer to be default install paths of sublime and HDFView as of today \(HDFview installs to local appdata folder nowadays\) using environment variables as in the labscript\_utils pull request. As such, this shouldn’t be merged before that pull request is merged and labscript\_utils stamped with a version number.
content.html: I’ve also modified the default text editor and HDF5 viewer to be default install paths of sublime and HDFView as of today (HDFview installs to local appdata folder nowadays) using environment variables as in the labscript_utils pull request. As such, this shouldn’t be merged before that pull request is merged and labscript_utils stamped with a version number.
